Uses of Class
backend.peripheral.PeripheralFile

  • Packages that use PeripheralFile 
    Package Description
    backend.peripheral
    Package used to store classes pertaining to the detection and importation of evidence files from external hardware.
    backend.storage
    Set of classes used to represent the structure of the /cases/ directory managed by PEMS.
    gui.components.icon
    Package containing the class for the ImgIcon component, as well as its subclasses.

    • Uses of PeripheralFile in backend.peripheral

      Fields in backend.peripheral with type parameters of type PeripheralFile 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<PeripheralFile> Device.files 
      Methods in backend.peripheral that return types with arguments of type PeripheralFile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<PeripheralFile> Device.getFiles()
      Returns an ArrayList of PeripheralFile objects representing all of the potential evidence files detected on this device.
      private java.util.ArrayList<PeripheralFile> Device.retrieveFiles(java.io.File directory, java.util.ArrayList<PeripheralFile> files)
      Recursive method used to scan this device for potential evidence files, in the form of valid jpeg or png images.
      Method parameters in backend.peripheral with type arguments of type PeripheralFile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<PeripheralFile> Device.retrieveFiles(java.io.File directory, java.util.ArrayList<PeripheralFile> files)

    • Uses of PeripheralFile in backend.storage

      Methods in backend.storage with parameters of type PeripheralFile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Case.AddFileResult Case.addFile(PeripheralFile file, boolean delete)
      Adds the PeripheralFile object specified in the parameters to this case by copying said file to the directories managed by PEMS, and adding it to the global ArrayLists.
